entities.name: dumbledore's army
entities.description: Dumbledore's Army is mentioned as the group that practices in this place.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the members of Dumbledore's Army and is described as slightly nervous.

entities.name: cho
entities.description: Cho is a member of Dumbledore's Army and agrees with Harry that the place is fantastic.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is a member of Dumbledore's Army and finds the place bizarre.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is a member of Dumbledore's Army and remembers hiding from Filch in this broom cupboard with Fred.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is the person that Harry and George hid from in this broom cupboard.

entities.name: dean
entities.description: Dean asks Harry what the stuff is, indicating the Sneako scopes and the Foe-Glass.

entities.name: sneako scopes
entities.description: Sneako scopes are mentioned as Dark Detectors that show when Dark wizards or enemies are around.

relationships.description: Harry is a member of Dumbledore's Army.
Cho is a member of Dumbledore's Army.
Fred is a member of Dumbledore's Army.
George is a member of Dumbledore's Army.
Filch was hidden in this broom cupboard by Harry and George.
Dean asked Harry what the stuff is, indicating the Sneako scopes and the Foe-Glass.
Harry explained to Dean that the Sneako scopes are Dark Detectors.
